name: The Colony (itch) (Potat0Ninja)
description:
Welcome to your new colony!

your task is simple  - colonize this new planet! use your resources to expand and build. There is a catch though, this planet is infested with killer aliens, who will try to destroy your colony and kill your people. Defend your colony and thrive!

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys or Right Clik & Drag to move the camera

Left Click to control the game

Space to reset view

Scroll Wheel to zoom in/out

Work In Progress

This game is a pretty ambitious challenge for 2 beginners to complete in 14 days. Sadly, we did not make it. A lot of artwork and sounds are missing, a lot of concepts are not  developed to their full extent, and bugs are very probable. With this said, we still believe the core gameplay and the ideas implemented are fun, so give it a try.

Thank you!

Hey, we are the ones that developed this game. We are two students who just learned C# and Unity a few weeks ago, we will be happy to hear your thoughts!
